oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of Capt. Lewis, 42nd Mo. Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de visite of Capt. Lewis 42nd Mo. Inf. Regt., USA. The officer appears in a single breasted frock coat with sword belt, sash and is wearing a Scottish tam. The backmark reads E. Long/ Photographer/Benton Barracks/St. Louis. It also has a Washington 3 cent revenue stamp. This is most likely William H. Lewis of Company A. In the winter and spring of 1865 he was listed as commanding scouts in the field and as commander of the post at McMinnville, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lewis, [?], Captain
